short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a shortcut that focuses the cursor on the first text input.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The default shortcuts are:
'Alt+I' - to focus on the first input on the entire page
'Alt+S' - to focus on the first input visible on the screen

The shortcuts are fully rebindable via the extension shortcut menu (chrome://extensions/shortcuts).

To view the code you can visit my GitHub repository: https://github.com/mikesglitch/Focus-First-Input
